data.name: Figurine Scene Simulator: Natural History (Premium Unlock)
data.detailed_description:
Join us on Discord for support, offer feedback and SFW / NSFW examples.
https://discord.gg/PEpkp6m96b

The Natural History Premium Unlocks provide additional customization features over the base franchise. The primary customization features include:

  • Artist Variants - When artists provide separate base meshes for characters to provide different looks or component options.
  • Character Components - Turn on/off figurine components, such as armor or clothes. Trade out materials to change the color of different components.
  • Morphs / Blendshapes - Many characters include blendshapes/morphs to change facial expressions or body part sizes, such as horns, etc.
  • Store Variants - We add "Store Variants" that provide different looks for characters by pre-selecting different sets of material colors, turning on/off components, such as different hair styles.

(Note: Not all characters support these features, please ask on our discussion forum if you'd like to know about any figurines in particular.)
https://steamcommunity.com/app/1659810/discussions/0/3183488224893197237/

You can currently try out these features for free in-game while we're in our "Jumpstart" release phase!

Base Content Information
https://store.steampowered.com/app/1835280/Figurine_Scene_Simulator_Natural_History_Franchise/

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel I5500
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: AMD R390 3GB
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel I6700
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVidia GTX 1650 6GB
